reviewText: Wouldn't play in my DVD player

My children grew up in the UK and are still young, so they will have a wonderful surprise after buying this and several others as well as a Region Free Dvd player to play all their UK favorites back in America!!!
It's a 3 videos in one. Volume first of a collection. Very good and fun. I like to watch with my daughter

We are brits but now live in Florida. My daughter LOVED Ben and Holly, and i have to admit, it didn't grate when i would have it on in the background either. I began to actually think it was so sweet and cute, so i had to buy this for her. The delivery was so much quicker than i expected, so this is a little thumbs up to the seller also. :)
The dvd is great, i just wish there were more episodes on it. OR more dvd or series?
